briefTitle: Application of Rapid On-site Evaluation in Lymph Node Biopsy of Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Application of Rapid On-site Evaluation in Lymph Node Biopsy of Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: The number of positive and negative lymph nodes diagnosed by ROSE technique
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients had pathologically confirmed primary breast cancer
* Surgical treatment was available

Exclusion Criteria:

* Previous history of surgery on the affected axilla, internal breast or chest
* Pregnant or breastfeeding patients
* Previous radiotherapy or chemotherapy
* Complicated history of other tumors
